title: Spectacle Director Showcase: Oh Yeah Wow

abstract: Interview with Melbourne based creative collective 'Oh Yeah Wow'.
description: 'Oh Yeah Wow' are a Melbourne based creative collective that make music videos, short films and TV programs. In this interview directors Darcy Prendergast, Seamus Spilsbury and Josh Thomas discuss music videos.  Created as part of "Spectacle : The Music Video Exhibition" 26 September 2013 - 23 February 2014. ACMI Digital Programs worked with Exhibitions to interview five Australian directors featured in the exhibition about the art and techniques of music video production.
